data.comment: Brentford kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Goal! Mathias Jensen gives Brentford a 1-0 lead in London.
In the minute 23, Goal! Brentford extend their lead to 2-0 through Bryan Mbeumo.
It's now 3-0 in London as Bryan Mbeumo scores for Brentford.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Mathias Jensen for Brentford has been booked by Keith Stroud and receives a first yellow card.
Reading have kicked-off the second half at Griffin Park.
The home team replace Rico Henry with Dominic Thompson.
In the minute 53, Sam Baldock (Reading) has received a first yellow card.
Sone Aluko is replacing Alfa Semedo for Reading at Griffin Park.
Sone Aluko (Reading) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 3-1 at Griffin Park.
In the minute 64, Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a second substitution, with Saman Ghoddos replacing Bryan Mbeumo.
The home team have replaced Joshua Da Silva with Emiliano Marcondes. This is the third substitution made today by Thomas Frank.
Marcus Forss is on a sub for Sergi Canos for Brentford.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Vitaly Janelt (Brentford) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
